questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: Reimbursements are not payable for illnesses that are the expression or direct consequence of pathological situations existing prior to the conclusion of the policy (Policy context 3, ART. 15 â€“ EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS FOR ALL GUARANTEES)
